page.title: 07Employment in Staining Cl. 4
page.content: A sample of 110 adults in Staining was taken. This shows 72% working, 28% not. Non workers- 60% retired 40% raising families. Wages - monthly 41% Weekly 52% Monthly/weekly 3% Self employed 3% Stipend 1% Very varied list of jobs - Teachers 12% Nurses 10% Managerial 8% Catering 8% Clerical 6% Secretarial 6% Shopworkers 6% Civil Service 6% Motor Trade 5% Engineering 4% Laboratory work 4% Dental care 4% Electrical 3% Design & planning 3% Librarians 2% Doctors 2% Aircraft industry 2%. Remaining jobs include labouring, bar work, machining, butcher, postman, bus & ambulance driving, pig farmer, fireman, bingo, reporter, printer, milk supervisor, and a priest. 90% of the sample like work reasons given include satisfaction, meeting people & challenge. 9% think work is boring and monotonous. 1% undecided.
